screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint from skin import getSkinFactor f = getSkinFactor() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (int(textsize[0] * 1.03), int(textsize[1] * 1.03)) wsizex = textsize[0] + 30 * f wsizey = textsize[1] + 25 * f if 400 * f > wsizex: wsizex = 400 * f listlen = len(self.list) descr = "" for x in range(listlen): lensizex = len(self.list[x][0][0]) * 6.18 + 175 * f if "\t" in self.list[x][0][0]: lensizex += 70 * f if lensizex > wsizex: wsizex = lensizex if len(self.list[x][0]) > 2 and isinstance(self.list[x][0][2], str) and len(self.list[x][0][2]) > len(descr): descr = self.list[x][0][2] listlen = listlen * 30 * f if listlen > 300 * f: listlen = 300 * f wsizey += listlen self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(int(3 * f), int(wsizey - listlen - 5 * f))) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*(int(wsizex - 6 * f), int(listlen)))) if descr: self["description"].instance.resize(eSize(*(int(wsizex - 30 * f), int(70 * f)))) self["description"].setText(descr) textsize = int(self["description"].getSize()[1]) self["description"].instance.resize(eSize(*(int(wsizex - 30 * f), int(textsize)))) self["description"].instance.move(ePoint(int(15 * f), int(wsizey + 5 * f))) wsizey += textsize + 10 * f self.instance.resize(eSize(*(int(wsizex), int(wsizey)))) self.instance.move(ePoint(int((1280 * f - wsizex) / 2), int((740 * f - wsizey) / 2)))
